result.title: My Nintendo（マイニンテンドー）
result.description:
My Nintendo is a free app that makes your Nintendo gaming experience even more fun, convenient, and rewarding.

With this app, you can check your My Nintendo Points balance, your Nintendo Switch gameplay history, the latest information on "interesting" software, and My Nintendo Store software and merchandise. This app is also convenient for check-ins at Nintendo official stores like Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO and various events.

Key Features of the My Nintendo App

◆ Check Your My Nintendo Points Balance
- Check your My Nintendo Gold/Platinum Points balance.
- Check points expiring at the end of the month, and receive a notification before their expiration.

- Check information on merchandise that can be redeemed with Platinum Points.
- Check the latest merchandise information before your Platinum Points expire.

◆ Check Your Gameplay History
- Check your Recent Log of games you've played and checked in on Nintendo Switch.
- View your play history for the past week, showing when, which software, and how long you played, down to the last day.
- You can also view your event check-ins using GPS or QR codes.

- Check a list of all the software you've played so far.
- View records of software played on Nintendo Switch, as well as on Nintendo 3DS and Wii U up until the end of February 2020. *1

- "Which game have you played the longest?" "When did you first play?" Tracing back memories might lead to some surprising discoveries. You can sort your playlists in various orders and choose to show or hide them.
(*1) To view your Nintendo 3DS and Wii U records, you must link your Nintendo Account and Nintendo Network ID.

◆ Check the latest information on "interesting" software
- Receive news on Nintendo Switch games, live events, character merchandise, and more.
・When you "Interested" in news, you can check related articles and follow-up updates, and check upcoming events on "Home."
・You can also watch "Nintendo Direct," where Nintendo directly announces the latest information, through this app. Notifications of upcoming broadcasts are also provided, making it easy to avoid missing live broadcasts. You can also watch past archived videos from the app.

◆ Shop at My Nintendo Store*2
・My Nintendo Store is packed with products exclusive to the store, including Nintendo Switch games, character merchandise, and store-exclusive items.
・Quickly browse information on various Nintendo Switch software, including "Latest Releases" and "Sales."
・Don't miss out on great deals. Add products you're interested in to your "Wish List" in the My Nintendo Store and receive notifications when they go on sale.
(*2) You can access the My Nintendo Store from this app.

◆ Check in with GPS
・Use your device's GPS function to check in at the official Nintendo stores "Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO" and various other events. *3
(*3) To use the GPS check-in function, you must allow location access on your device. Locations and events where GPS check-in is available vary depending on the time of year.

◆ Display your Nintendo Account QR Code
・You can instantly display your Nintendo Account QR code from "My Page."
・Present your Nintendo Account QR code when purchasing products at the official Nintendo stores "Nintendo TOKYO / OSAKA / KYOTO" or at certain events to receive special rewards.
・Event information will be announced in the app's "News" section, so don't miss it.

[Usage]
・To use some features of this app, you must log in with your Nintendo Account.
・Internet access is required to use the app. Data usage may be incurred.
・This app requires a device with Android 9.0 or later installed.

QR Code is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE Inc.
© 2020 Nintendo

result.summary: The latest information on software and events, and memories of playing games, all in one place
result.developerLegalAddress: 11-1, KAMITOBAHOKODATECHO, MINAMI-KU, KYOTO, 京都府 601-8116, Japan
result.recentChanges:
・使い勝手の改善を行いました。
・不具合の修正を行いました。
・Android 対応バージョンを変更しました。このアプリを使用するには、Android 9.0以降のバージョンのOSをインストールした端末が必要です。
